8094  if(!app->get_subcommands(
8095  [](const CLI::App *subc) { return ((!subc->get_disabled()) && (!subc->get_name().empty())); })
8096  .empty()) {
8097  out << " " << (app->get_require_subcommand_min() == 0 ? "[" : "")
8098  << get_label(app->get_require_subcommand_max() < 2 || app->get_require_subcommand_min() > 1 ? "SUBCOMMAND"
8099  : "SUBCOMMANDS")
8100  << (app->get_require_subcommand_min() == 0 ? "]" : "");
8101  }
8102 
8103  out << std::endl;
8104 
8105  return out.str();
8106 }
8107 
8108 inline std::string Formatter::make_footer(const App *app) const {
8109  std::string footer = app->get_footer();
8110  if(footer.empty()) {
8111  return std::string{};
8112  }
8113  return footer + "\n";
8114 }
8115 
8116 inline std::string Formatter::make_help(const App *app, std::string name, AppFormatMode mode) const {
8117 
8118  // This immediately forwards to the make_expanded method. This is done this way so that subcommands can
8119  // have overridden formatters
8120  if(mode == AppFormatMode::Sub)
8121  return make_expanded(app);
8122 
8123  std::stringstream out;
8124  if((app->get_name().empty()) && (app->get_parent() != nullptr)) {
8125  if(app->get_group() != "Subcommands") {
8126  out << app->get_group() << ':';
8127  }
8128  }
8129 
8130  out << make_description(app);
8131  out << make_usage(app, name);
8132  out << make_positionals(app);
8133  out << make_groups(app, mode);
8134  out << make_subcommands(app, mode);
8135  out << '\n' << make_footer(app);
8136 
8137  return out.str();
8138 }
8139 
8140 inline std::string Formatter::make_subcommands(const App *app, AppFormatMode mode) const {
8141  std::stringstream out;
8142 
8143  std::vector<const App *> subcommands = app->get_subcommands({});
8144 
8145  // Make a list in definition order of the groups seen
8146  std::vector<std::string> subcmd_groups_seen;
8147  for(const App *com : subcommands) {
8148  if(com->get_name().empty()) {
8149  if(!com->get_group().empty()) {
8150  out << make_expanded(com);
8151  }
8152  continue;
8153  }
8154  std::string group_key = com->get_group();
8155  if(!group_key.empty() &&
8156  std::find_if(subcmd_groups_seen.begin(), subcmd_groups_seen.end(), [&group_key](std::string a) {
8157  return detail::to_lower(a) == detail::to_lower(group_key);
8158  }) == subcmd_groups_seen.end())
8159  subcmd_groups_seen.push_back(group_key);
8160  }
8161 
8162  // For each group, filter out and print subcommands
8163  for(const std::string &group : subcmd_groups_seen) {
8164  out << "\n" << group << ":\n";
8165  std::vector<const App *> subcommands_group = app->get_subcommands(
8166  [&group](const App *sub_app) { return detail::to_lower(sub_app->get_group()) == detail::to_lower(group); });
8167  for(const App *new_com : subcommands_group) {
8168  if(new_com->get_name().empty())
8169  continue;
8170  if(mode != AppFormatMode::All) {
8171  out << make_subcommand(new_com);
8172  } else {
8173  out << new_com->help(new_com->get_name(), AppFormatMode::Sub);
8174  out << "\n";
8175  }
8176  }
8177  }
8178 
8179  return out.str();
8180 }
8181 
8182 inline std::string Formatter::make_subcommand(const App *sub) const {
8183  std::stringstream out;
8184  detail::format_help(out, sub->get_name(), sub->get_description(), column_width_);
8185  return out.str();
8186 }
8187 
8188 inline std::string Formatter::make_expanded(const App *sub) const {
8189  std::stringstream out;
8190  out << sub->get_display_name() << "\n";
8191 
8192  out << make_description(sub);
8193  out << make_positionals(sub);
8194  out << make_groups(sub, AppFormatMode::Sub);
8195  out << make_subcommands(sub, AppFormatMode::Sub);
8196 
8197  // Drop blank spaces
8198  std::string tmp = detail::find_and_replace(out.str(), "\n\n", "\n");
8199  tmp = tmp.substr(0, tmp.size() - 1); // Remove the final '\n'
8200 
8201  // Indent all but the first line (the name)
8202  return detail::find_and_replace(tmp, "\n", "\n ") + "\n";
8203 }
8204 
8205 inline std::string Formatter::make_option_name(const Option *opt, bool is_positional) const {
8206  if(is_positional)
8207  return opt->get_name(true, false);
8208 
8209  return opt->get_name(false, true);
8210 }
8211 
8212 inline std::string Formatter::make_option_opts(const Option *opt) const {
8213  std::stringstream out;
8214 
8215  if(opt->get_type_size() != 0) {
8216  if(!opt->get_type_name().empty())
8217  out << " " << get_label(opt->get_type_name());
8218  if(!opt->get_default_str().empty())
8219  out << "=" << opt->get_default_str();
8220  if(opt->get_expected_max() == detail::expected_max_vector_size)
8221  out << " ...";
8222  else if(opt->get_expected_min() > 1)
8223  out << " x " << opt->get_expected();
8224 
8225  if(opt->get_required())
8226  out << " " << get_label("REQUIRED");
8227  }
8228  if(!opt->get_envname().empty())
8229  out << " (" << get_label("Env") << ":" << opt->get_envname() << ")";
8230  if(!opt->get_needs().empty()) {
8231  out << " " << get_label("Needs") << ":";
8232  for(const Option *op : opt->get_needs())
8233  out << " " << op->get_name();
8234  }
8235  if(!opt->get_excludes().empty()) {
8236  out << " " << get_label("Excludes") << ":";
8237  for(const Option *op : opt->get_excludes())
8238  out << " " << op->get_name();
8239  }
8240  return out.str();
8241 }
8242 
8243 inline std::string Formatter::make_option_desc(const Option *opt) const { return opt->get_description(); }
8244 
8245 inline std::string Formatter::make_option_usage(const Option *opt) const {
8246  // Note that these are positionals usages
8247  std::stringstream out;
8248  out << make_option_name(opt, true);
8249  if(opt->get_expected_max() >= detail::expected_max_vector_size)
8250  out << "...";
8251  else if(opt->get_expected_max() > 1)
8252  out << "(" << opt->get_expected() << "x)";
8253 
8254  return opt->get_required() ? out.str() : "[" + out.str() + "]";
8255 }
8256 
8257 } // namespace CLI
